author: asmuts
msg: I put a socket cleanup into the sendandreceive method.
This needs further consideration, but it seems prudent.
I still don't recommend using the lateral for gets.

author: asmuts
msg: This is a memory plugin using jdk1.4 LinkedHashMap.  The LinkedHashMap was suggested as an alternative to the LRU implementation in the main repository.
There may be some syncronization problems.
I haven't noticed a performance difference with the standard LRU.  I need to retest.

author: asmuts
msg: It should be safe to dispose now.  Kill queue, optimize, then play dead.

Fixed a problem in the ReadWriteLock class that let the number of writelocks get below zero.  This seems to have solved many problems.  However, I can't find out why there are more done calls than lock calls.   Added a break into the wait on the readlock in case noone calls notify.
This may have fixed the mysterious locking problem that I've never been able to duplicate.
